VARIABLES.NAME: is_spam
VARIABLES.DESCRIPTION: Indicates if the results are spam or not by comparing if the spam value is greater than the ham value

VARIABLES.NAME: prediction
VARIABLES.DESCRIPTION: The prediction value of the spam/ham value, spam if is_spam is true, ham if is_spam is false

VARIABLES.NAME: predictions
VARIABLES.DESCRIPTION: String:Float combination of all the predictions, includes ham and spam as key values
